name: Mix Fruit Jam Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mix Fruit Jam Recipe: Banana 1 Orange 1 Guava 1 Apple 2 Lemon Juice 2 tbsp Sugar 1 cup heaped Water 1 cup Red Food Color a pinch
instructions: Wash peel and cut fruits into small pieces cook with water till tender Then blend fruit and put in a pan with sugar and juice. Cook rapidly until set stirring continuously until the jam falls from spoon in the thick drops. Keep the jars clean fill bottles.
